author: wn.com
title: Disaster Recovery Centers in South Carolina Open in Florence and Kershaw Counties (FEMA - Federal ...
text: ( Source : FEMA - Federal Emergency Management Agency ) COLUMBIA, S.C. - Two disaster recovery centers are open in Florence and Kershaw counties to help South Carolina flood survivors. The centers are open 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. seven days a week.
